hero_slider.subtitle_1: Digital tools designed for citizen participation for governments and institutions
hero_slider.subtitle_3: For legislative, executive and judiciary power, decentralized bodies, political parties, organisations and other kind of institutions.
hero_slider.image_description_3: Photo: Guillermo Batakis, Buenos Aires, Argentina

products.subtitle_1: Digital platform for participatory budget management, promoting a dialogue between citizenship, project authors and governments.
products.description_1: Digital platform to manage integrally a participatory budget, promoting a dialogue between citizenship, project authors and governments.
products.subtitle_2: Digital platform for consultation, dialogue and debate between a government and its community.
products.description_2: Digital platform for consultation, dialogue and debate between a government and its community.
products.subtitle_3: Digital platform to elaborate collaboratively bills/laws between parliaments and citizenship.
products.description_3: Digital platform to elaborate collaboratively bills/laws between legislators/deputies and citizenship.
products.subtitle_4: Digital platform that allows the publication of government goals and commitments, facilitating citizen monitoring.
products.description_4: Digital platform that allows the publication of government goals and commitments, facilitating citizen monitoring

instalations.main_title: Three different ways to implement our products:
instalations.description_1: Every Democracy OS product is open source and has a GPL - v.3 licence. This means that the product can be installed according to your own necessities for free.
instalations.description_2: Our software team carry out the installation of the platform on your server.
instalations.description_3: New tailored version. We can customize it with our dev team and assist the project managers.

nosotros.title: About us
nosotros.subtitle: We are Democracia en Red, a civil society organization based in Argentina composed by activists, developers and social scientists with the objective of opening public institutions and giving access to decision-making spaces.

cases.subtitle_2: Secretary of Modernization of the Nation

footer.title: democraciaOS
footer.description: Technology moves forward and changes our lives. It is time for political systems to open up to citizen participation.
footer.copyright_1: Democracia OS is a project from
footer.copyright_2: , a NGO based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

header_1.description: Digital platform that allows the integral management of Participatory Budgets, generating instances of dialogue, co-governance between the citizens and the governments, adapting it to the context and the regulations of each region.

header_2.description: A digital citizen participation tool that allows governments and institutions to consult on different public policies, enabling citizens to comment, vote, rank, choose between option, or establish degrees of valuation in public matters.

header_3.description: Digital platform for governments and institutions that allows the publication of goals and commitments, facilitating the monitoring of progress and active transparency.

header_4.description: A digital tool that opens up dialogue and makes the process of drafting norms transparent, where representatives consider the laws to be drawn up, inviting them to leave their contributions.

product_specs_1.features_1_1: Allows the team to adapt the platform to local needs by defining the segmentation in districts, the coexistence of one or more budget items, the number of votes per user, the existence of special sponsors, whether or not the platform is integrated with a classroom electoral device, etc.
product_specs_1.features_2_1: Open to citizenship in a specific area.
product_specs_1.features_2_2: Encourages the involvement of citizens in the development of public policies on a given budget.
product_specs_1.features_2_4: Possibility of sharing in social networks.
product_specs_1.features_3_2: Criteria informed to participating citizens clearly.
product_specs_1.features_3_3: Communication With authors for improvement of proposals.
product_specs_1.features_4_1: Open to citizens of a specific region/area.
product_specs_1.features_5_3: Notification of the authors of the winning proposals.
product_specs_1.features_6_1: Established committees by the government/actor that opens up the participatory process.
product_specs_1.features_6_4: Strengthens the link between citizenship and the actor that opens the process.

product_specs_2.features_1_1: Allows the citizenry to organize or drag pre-determined options in the order that best fits their priorities.
product_specs_2.features_1_4: Once the vote is complete, the results are displayed.
product_specs_2.features_2_1: Allows the citizenry to organize or drag pre-determined options in the order that best fits your priorities.
product_specs_2.features_2_4: Once the vote is complete, the results are displayed.
product_specs_2.features_3_1: Allows the citizenry to organize or drag pre-determined options in the order that best fits your priorities.
product_specs_2.features_3_4: Once the vote is complete, the results are displayed.
product_specs_2.features_4_1: Allows the citizenry to organize or drag pre-determined options in the order that best fits your priorities.
product_specs_2.features_4_4: Once the vote is complete, the results are displayed.
product_specs_2.features_5_1: Allows the citizenry to organize or drag pre-determined options in the order that best fits your priorities.
product_specs_2.features_5_4: Once the vote is complete, the results are displayed.
product_specs_2.features_6_1: Open call for the public to propose ideas or projects.
product_specs_2.features_6_2: Allows citizens to support ideas or proposals already made by other citizens.
product_specs_2.features_6_3: Open or pre-determined term of participation.
product_specs_2.features_6_4: Ability to share proposals across networks.
product_specs_2.features_6_5: Allows the public to leave comments on the proposals made.

product_specs_3.features_1_2: Includes button with access link to a community.
product_specs_3.features_1_4: Transparency organizations dedicated to its monitoring.
product_specs_3.features_1_5: Possibility to subscribe to receive updates.
product_specs_3.features_2_2: Qualitative: Contains milestones relevant to compliance.
product_specs_3.features_2_4: update through quantitative and descriptive reports.
product_specs_3.features_3_2: Can be backed up with photos and files.
product_specs_3.features_3_4: Allows you to update the goal indicator, indicate milestone achievement, or tell a novelty.
product_specs_3.features_3_5: Posibilidad de suscribirse para recibir actualizaciones.
product_specs_3.features_4_2: Serves as a mechanism of legitimacy of the reports.

product_specs_4.features_2_2: Allows the inclusion of informative videos.
product_specs_4.features_4_1: Encourages citizen participation to build better laws.
product_specs_4.features_4_2: Open space dialogue between citizens and their representatives.
product_specs_4.features_5_2: Allows a clear follow-up of the changes made.
product_specs_4.features_5_3: Demonstrates that citizens' contributions are effectively incorporated.
